definition: To enter a place, typically used to describe the action of coming inside a building or room.

examples.german: Er hat vergessen, die Tür zu schließen, als er hereinkam.
examples.english: He forgot to close the door when he came in.

examples.german: Ich habe gehört, dass du hereingekommen bist.
examples.english: I heard that you came in.
Come in and have a seat!
